Title: Repeals certain provisions establishing a fee for background checks on certain firearm and ammunition purchases and amends the source of funds for the background check fund accordingly
Summary: Repeals certain provisions establishing a fee for background checks on certain firearm and ammunition purchases; removes such fees as a source of funds for the background check fund.
LawCode: Rpld ยง228 sub 5, Exec L; amd ยง99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the executive law establishing a fee for background checks on certain firearm and ammunition purchases; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the source of funds for the background check fund
